our_candidate.name: Angela Russo
our_candidate.background: State Attorney General, former federal prosecutor, Italian-American, Pittsburgh native, consumer protection focus

opponent.name: Jeff Hartley
opponent.background: Former pharmaceutical executive, suburban Philadelphia, wealthy self-funder, moderate positioning

demographics.economic_profile: Manufacturing legacy, healthcare industry growth, fracking debate, cost of living pressures, significant economic disparity between regions

notes: Open seat win in presidential year. Russo's prosecutor background and consumer protection record contrasted well with Hartley's pharma executive background. Philadelphia suburbs delivered margin while Scranton provided base. Pittsburgh turnout strong. Abortion continued as mobilizing issue. Healthcare costs messaging linked well to opposition research on Hartley's pharma background.
